Paella by the Beach

July 26, 2012

Piglet went for Sunday paella down by the beach at the invitation of Dan and Charlie.

She had the fideau paella, which is a seafood noodle paella featuring clams, prawns, and squid.

The squid ink makes it all black, inky, and somewhat messy.

OMNOMNOM NOMNOMNOM.

Coming up on her first birthday

July 25, 2012

Coming up on her first birthday, it was time for Riu to get acquainted with the rough and tumble of the water. She has a long career of whitewater kayaking ahead of her.
